title: San Francisco: city at the end of the rainbow
brief_description: This travelogue takes the viewer on a tour of San Francisco to discover the curious and unusual facets of the city. Among the many attractions of San Francisco is a cable car ride to Fisherman’s Wharf, Alcatraz, one of the city’s most eeriest attractions, the Columbus Day Parade and the fascinating spectacle of fog rolling in over the city. Take a trip along the Golden Gate Bridge and never leave your armchair.
